divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching fireworks in Las Vegas. We viewed a bright redish object come from the north heading south for 2 minutes before the light turned west and over the course of 2 minutes faded from view. There were no flashing tail lights or any sound.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were 2 other sightings in Las Vegas on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: Strong redish light heading south over west las vegas then turning west and faded from view. No flashing plane lights
